titleStmt.title: To the present assembly, members of parliament at Westminster. The considerations of a servant of the Lord, upon the present state of affairs, presented unto you for to read and consider, as informations unto you, concerning present proceedings in this nation.
titleStmt.author: Burrough, Edward, 1634-1662.

notesStmt.note: Author and publication information suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: cropped with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Friends' Library, London.
